description:
Taxed natural gas

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73431 Energy tax statistics

Definition:
Natural gas is a product subject to excise duties, in this
case energy tax. Natural gas as defined in the Energy Tax
Act (Section 1a no. 14 of the Energy Tax Act) refers to
goods of headings 2711 11 (natural gas, liquefied) and 2711
21 (natural gas, in gaseous state) of the Combined
Nomenclature.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Taxed natural gas
